Package utils

Class FixtureNode

java.lang.Object
utils.FixtureNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseNode
public class FixtureNode extends Object implements BaseNode
A basic BaseNode to check whether Utils coded correctly or not.

      public BaseNode newInstance​(UUID selfId, MiddleLayer network, MetricsCollector metricsCollector)
      Description copied from interface: BaseNode
      This method serves as a factory for new node instances. It is supposed to return a new instance of the special node class

      selfId - the ID of the new node
      network - communication network for the new node.

      Description copied from interface: BaseNode

      Specified by:
